attributes.action: Stop the 'closed shop' attitude of Independent Prep. Schools who force parents to buy school uniforms from them at inflated prices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Private and independent Preparatory Schools should  not prevent parents of children who attend such schools from buying school uniforms from sources other than the school. Such schools are charging  up to twice the cost of uniforms that can be made available to parents in the free market place.
